trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> 中的標籤。

trans-unit.source: You use a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab> to organize related groups of commands in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>.
trans-unit.target: 您使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab>組織相關的群組中的命令<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab> hosts one or more <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup> instances.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab>裝載一或多個<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup> then hosts controls that represent application commands.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup>然後裝載控制項代表應用程式的命令。

trans-unit.source: The following list shows the typical hierarchy of elements in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab>.
trans-unit.target: 下列清單顯示一般階層中的項目<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab>。

<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonButton>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonRadioButton>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToggleButton>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonCheckBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox>
<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton>

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the markup for a simple ribbon tab.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示簡單的功能區索引標籤的標記。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The element that is used to display the item.
trans-unit.target: 用來顯示項目 (Item) 的項目 (Element)。

trans-unit.source: The item to display from the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> 中顯示的項目。

trans-unit.source: Unloads the container for the specified item.
trans-unit.target: 卸載所指定項目的容器。

trans-unit.source: This method undoes the effects of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab.PrepareContainerForItemOverride%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可復原的效果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab.PrepareContainerForItemOverride%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup" /> that this tab is in.
trans-unit.target: 獲取此標籤所在位置之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup" /> 的參考。

trans-unit.source: The contextual tab group that this tab is in; or <see langword="null" /> if this tab is not in a contextual tab group.
trans-unit.target: 此索引標籤所在的內容索引標籤群組，如果此索引標籤不在內容索引標籤群組中，則為 <see langword="null" />。
已註冊的預設值是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關什麼可能會影響該值的詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性的值優先順序](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。

trans-unit.source: You use a *contextual tab* to display groups of commands that are relevant only in a particular context.
trans-unit.target: 您使用*內容相關索引標籤*顯示群組的只在特定內容相關的命令。

trans-unit.source: Contextual tab groups are shown or hidden based on specified criteria.
trans-unit.target: 內容相關索引標籤群組顯示或隱藏根據指定的準則。

trans-unit.source: For example, an Ink Tools tab group might be shown when tablet input is detected, or a Picture Tools tab group might be shown when an Image object is selected.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，當偵測到 tablet 輸入時，或圖片工具索引標籤群組可能會顯示選取的映像物件時，可能會顯示 筆跡工具索引標籤群組。
相依性屬性資訊
識別項欄位
中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`
無

trans-unit.source: The following example shows a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab> named **Pens** that is in the **Ink Tools** contextual tab group.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例所示<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab>名為**畫筆**位於**筆跡工具**內容相關索引標籤群組。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the header content of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup" /> that this tab is in.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定此標籤所在之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup" /> 的標題內容。

trans-unit.source: The header of the contextual tab group that this tab is in; or <see langword="null" /> if this tab is not in a contextual tab group.
trans-unit.target: 此索引標籤所在內容索引標籤群組的標題，如果此索引標籤不在內容索引標籤群組中，則為 <see langword="null" />。
已註冊的預設值是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關什麼可能會影響該值的詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性的值優先順序](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。
相依性屬性資訊
識別項欄位
中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`
無
識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab.ContextualTabGroupHeader" /> 相依性屬性。
識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab.ContextualTabGroup" /> 相依性屬性。
傳回新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> container object that is used to display an item from the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: 新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> 容器物件，這個物件是用來顯示 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> 容器中的某個項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> names that specify the order in which group size definitions are applied as the ribbon is reduced in size.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> 名稱的集合，它會指定功能區縮減大小時，要套用群組大小定義的順序。

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> names that specify the order in which group size definitions are applied as the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> is reduced in size.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> 名稱的集合，它會指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> 縮減大小時，要套用群組大小定義的順序。
已註冊的預設值是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關什麼可能會影響該值的詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性的值優先順序](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。
相依性屬性資訊
識別項欄位
中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`
無

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to specify the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab.GroupSizeReductionOrder%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何指定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab.GroupSizeReductionOrder%2A>。
識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab.GroupSizeReductionOrder" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab" /> supports custom keyboard scrolling.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab" /> 是否支援自訂鍵盤捲動。
所有情況下都是 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is used to notify the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab> that keyboard input has been handled the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性用來通知<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>中<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab>鍵盤輸入已經處理過<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style that is applied to the header of the ribbon tab.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定套用至功能區標籤標題的樣式。

trans-unit.source: The style that is applied to the header of the ribbon tab. The registered default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 套用至 [功能區] 索引標籤的標頭的樣式。已註冊的預設值是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關什麼可能會影響該值的詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性的值優先順序](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。
相依性屬性資訊
識別項欄位
中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`
無
識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab.HeaderStyle" /> 相依性屬性。
要測試的項目。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified item is (or is eligible to be) its own container.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，這個值表示指定的項目是否 (或是否有資格) 是其本身的容器。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the item is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此項目為 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> 則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the ribbon tab is selected.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示是否已選取功能區索引標籤。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this tab is selected; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已選取這個索引標籤則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。
已註冊的預設值是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關什麼可能會影響該值的詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性的值優先順序](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。
相依性屬性資訊
識別項欄位
中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.BindsTwoWayByDefault%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsParentMeasure%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.Journal%2A>
識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab.IsSelected" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the keyboard shortcut for the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項的鍵盤快速鍵。

trans-unit.source: The keyboard shortcut for the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的鍵盤快速鍵。
已註冊的預設值是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關什麼可能會影響該值的詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性的值優先順序](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。

trans-unit.source: A KeyTip must be from 1 to 3 uppercase characters, and must not contain spaces, tabs, or newline characters.
trans-unit.target: KeyTip 必須介於 1 到 3 個大寫字元，而且必須包含空格、 定位字元或新行字元。

trans-unit.source: KeyTips are sometimes known as access keys or accelerators and are used as shortcut key combinations that activate controls.
trans-unit.target: 按鍵提示有時也稱為快速鍵或快速鍵，而且可用以啟動控制項的快速鍵組合。

trans-unit.source: KeyTips appear on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon> when you press the ALT key.
trans-unit.target: 按鍵提示會出現在<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>您按下 ALT 鍵。
相依性屬性資訊
識別項欄位
中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`
無
識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab.KeyTip" /> 相依性屬性。
包含啟動的相關資料。

trans-unit.source: Called when the KeyTip or accelerator key is pressed.
trans-unit.target: 在按下 KeyTip 或快速鍵時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabAutomationPeer" /> object for this control.
trans-unit.target: 為這個控制項建立新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabAutomationPeer" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A new automation peer object for this control.
trans-unit.target: 這個控制項的新自動對等物件。
變更的相關資訊。
<see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> 屬性變更時叫用。
事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown" /> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown" /> 已路由事件的類別處理。
包含啟動的相關資料。

trans-unit.source: Called when the KeyTip or accelerator key is accessed.
trans-unit.target: 在存取 KeyTip 或快速鍵時呼叫。
事件資料。
引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.Selected" /> 附加事件。

trans-unit.source: This method is called when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab.IsSelected%2A> property changes to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法時，會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab.IsSelected%2A>屬性變更為`true`。
事件資料。
引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.Unselected" /> 附加事件。

trans-unit.source: This method is called when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab.IsSelected%2A> property changes to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法時，會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab.IsSelected%2A>屬性變更為`false`。

trans-unit.source: The element that is used to display the item.
trans-unit.target: 用來顯示項目 (Item) 的項目 (Element)。

trans-unit.source: The item to display from the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> 中顯示的項目。

trans-unit.source: Prepares the specified element to display the specified item.
trans-unit.target: 準備指定項目 (Element) 以顯示指定項目 (Item)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> that this control belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個控制項所屬之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> 的參考。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> that this control belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 這個控制項所屬之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> 的參考。
已註冊的預設值是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關什麼可能會影響該值的詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性的值優先順序](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。

trans-unit.source: This property is set on the parent <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon> control and is inherited by the child controls.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性設定其父系<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>控制，而且會繼承由子控制項。

trans-unit.source: It is used to access visual style brushes defined on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon> class.
trans-unit.target: 它用來存取上定義的視覺化樣式筆刷<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>類別。
相依性屬性資訊
識別項欄位
中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`
無
識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab.Ribbon" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates the position of the left edge of the corresponding <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader" /> in the coordinate space of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，此值指出此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader" /> 座標空間中的對應 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab" /> 左邊緣的位置。

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates the position of the left edge of the corresponding <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader" /> in the coordinate space of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab" />.
trans-unit.target: 一個值，此值指出此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader" /> 座標空間中的對應 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab" /> 左邊緣的位置。
已註冊的預設值是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關什麼可能會影響該值的詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性的值優先順序](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。
相依性屬性資訊
識別項欄位
中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`
無
識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab.TabHeaderLeft" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates the position of the right edge of the corresponding <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader" /> in the coordinate space of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，此值指出此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader" /> 座標空間中的對應 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab" /> 右邊緣的位置。

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates the position of the right edge of the corresponding <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader" /> in the coordinate space of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab" />.The registered default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 一個值，此值指出此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader" /> 座標空間中的對應 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab" /> 右邊緣的位置。登錄的預設值是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關什麼可能會影響該值的詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性的值優先順序](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。
相依性屬性資訊
識別項欄位
中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`
無
識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab.TabHeaderRight" /> 相依性屬性。
